'''Primal Embers''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Sumeru]] found in the Ruins of King Deshret.

They are energy aggregations that can be unleashed, pursued, and activate [[Primal Torch]]es.

Primal Embers are very fragile, so they can be blown away by the strong winds generated by giant fan blades.
